data.title: Historic Districts & Properties
data.text:
Properties located in Historic Districts

Did you know that nearly 20% of Hartford’s buildings are located on the National, State or Local Registers of Historic Places and protected under the city’s Historic Preservation Ordinance?

We are pleased to provide a comprehensive list (by address) of these properties that are individually listed or located in historic districts. Simply click on the link below to open the .pdf file.

Hartford Properties on National, State or Local Registers (last updated April 2022)

List of pre-1851 Hartford Buildings

National & State Registers of Historic Places

Most of the nomination forms for Hartford properties that are listed on the National Register of Historic Places have been digitized and are available to view on-line. Click on the property/district/Multiple Resource Area (MRA) name below and be linked to the corresponding site. Note: The following are provided for informational purposes only. Information may have been changed or added for a district or property but not added to the digitized file. Please contact us with any questions you have on specific properties.
